Plot: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.
Title: Gaslight
Writer: John Van Druten (screenplay), Walter Reisch (screenplay), John L. Balderston (screenplay), Patrick Hamilton (play)
Actors: Charles Boyer, Ingrid Bergman, Joseph Cotten, Dame May Whitty
